author: rickhall
msg: Modified the framework's handling of "removal pending" packages that
result from bundle updates or uninstalls. Previously the resolver would
ignore such packages when resolving new bundles, but now it will use
them. Additionally, the framework now checks to see if a bundle is in
use when it is updated or uninstalled and if none of its exports are
used, then it immediately refreshes that bundle.

author: dkulp
msg: Add profile to test using the snapshot version of the remote-resources-plugin to generate the NOTICE/DISCLAIMER/LICENSE files.
* Remove log4j.properties (we don't have any use of log4j)
* Add test.remoteresources profile in systests to test the SNAPSHOT of remote-resources-plugin.  I'm working with the maven folks to get this released so we can use it across the board.
